item.title: How to pass parameters from testng.xml file in TestNG
item.author: pawangaria@gmail.com (Pawan Garia)
item.description: TestNG lets you pass parameters directly to your test methods from the testng.xml file. Passing parameters from the XML file is important when you want to pass configurations like browser name, version,test-URL etc. directly into your Test. Passing these configurations is important because the values are changing and should be always dynamic. Passing Dynamic configuration values from testng.xml is important when you want to change parameters like browser or version or operatingSystem etc.
